ygData.subject: Re: I won my dream item!!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... If ... color. ... They d have to use yellow, since you could conceivably use /shout instead of say to get a red roll.  I m sure the zone would wonder what
ygData.messageBody:
> This is true, and to my knowledge it's the only way to cheat on a roll.
If
> Verant hopped the clue train and made the rolls appear in yellow or red
> there'd be no way to cheat. As it is, emotes and rolls are the same
color.
> Duh.

They'd have to use yellow, since you could conceivably use /shout instead of
say to get a red roll. I'm sure the zone would wonder what you're doing,
but they might just think you rolled while close to them, as we see roll's
in white show up from other groups all the time.

Also, it's impossible to set up a macro this long, so the cheater would have
to type it each and every time.

Darkfox Reven'tsol
Xegony
